column4: Sorry for the noobish question, also. Just installed linux from Vista
Is a directory? What does that mean! I want to put it into a directory
Thought I was using a different window
Why is this so hard to extract a .img? It keeps saying it can't find it
try from the terminal: sudo mount -t iso 9660 *.img -o loop /some_new_directory/somewhere
give me a sec might have given you wrong command
to unmount do umount -d directory i mean
i was typing "iso 9660" instead of iso9660 wich made that error you got
mount: wrong fs type, bad option, bad superblock on /dev/loop0,
i'm not quite sure then sorry:/
Well okay, thanks for the help
